short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ultimate search experience for anything you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for an Ebook? a Movie? a Manual?
Find everything you're looking for in one place! 

Download "Ultimate Searcher" to easily search for ebooks, movies, manuals, recipes and calendars!

This extension updates browser search provider and enable users to get results for books, manuals, movies and more.

Two ways to Search for what you need:
1. Pin the extension using the "puzzle" shape icon in the top right corner of your browser and and select the category you want.
2. Input your search keyword in the omni search bar

Easily get access to thousands of manuals, books, movies, and more search results with this extension.

This extension updates your browser default search settings in the following ways:
- Allows for custom searches directly from your browser omnibox
- Sets Yahoo as the default search setting in your browser"
